text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, 'iidha nada almwdhn lilsalat fi yawm aljmet, famdu 'iilaa smae alkhtbt wa'ada' alslat, watrku albye, wkdhlk alshira' wjmye ma yashghalukm enha, dhlk aldhy 'umrtm bih khayr lkm; lamaa fih min ghfran dhunubikum wmthwbt allah lkm, 'iin kuntum taelamun masalih 'anfusakum fafealuu dhalik. wafi alayat dalil ealaa wjwb hudur aljumeat wastmae alkhtbt
